meanings.definition: The action of flowing towards a particular point.
meanings.sent1: The affluxes of water in the river were strong after the heavy rain.
meanings.sent2: The affluxes of students towards the library during exam week were noticeable.
meanings.sent3: The affluxes of ants towards the picnic basket were quite determined.
meanings.sent4: The affluxes of emotions towards her heart overwhelmed her in that moment.
meanings.sent5: The affluxes of cars on the highway created a mesmerizing sight.

meanings.definition: A sudden rush or influx of something.
meanings.sent1: The affluxes of customers into the store during the sale were exciting.
meanings.sent2: The affluxes of memories flooded her mind when she visited her childhood home.
meanings.sent3: The affluxes of laughter in the comedy club were contagious.
meanings.sent4: The affluxes of ideas in his mind sparked a creative breakthrough.
meanings.sent5: The affluxes of birds into the garden added a lively touch to the atmosphere.
